title: TG:GeckoAI
author: TG:GeckoAI
content: Hello, everyone!We are trying very hard and have almost finished designing the website. We have also almost finished developing the contract and are planning to launch the token as early as next week.Website: https://geckoai.ioTelegram: https://t.me/GeckoAIWe are currently in the process of developing an AI-based bot that will change the way you trade cryptocurrencies. Our bot will use the latest technology to analyze real-time data from coingecko monitoring and predict when cryptocurrency prices are likely to go up. We are also proud to announce that our bot capable of generating custom images from text, allowing you to get a visual representation of market trends and other relevant data on demand. Additionally, our bot will be able to generate cryptocurrency and other crypto charts as pictures, making it easier than ever to keep track of the market.What's more, our bot will notify you of new coins added to the coingecko monitoring and help you make informed decisions on whether to buy or not based on the coin's contract, potential, developer, and other factors. With our bot, you'll be one step ahead of the game and making smarter trades in no time.Join us on Telegram to stay up-to-date with our progress and be the first to experience the future of cryptocurrency trading!
